name: Thermo-State
description:
On this entry for level up:beginners circle jam,you need to change heat for retrieve capsule;switch between hot,normal and cold tempatures to beat levels.The tempature can change the level:can expand some objects,or can activate spikes;think carefully and find a solution.

Controls:

Esc to pause,r to restart.

Switch to hot with z,to normal with x,and make it cool with c.

Credits:

Graphics and programming by Anomma

Font(Joystick Monospace) b y typodermicfonts.com

Sound effects and music by opengameart.org:

-Steam effect by user Bart

-Rock sound by user Pauliuw

-Wind sound by user Remaxim

-Menu music by user Tcarisland

-Level music by user Kenliten
